long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
ACID Price Ticker
Community built $ACID price ticker extension for chrome

What does it do?
- Show current market price on the persistent ticker (default currency USD)
- Show prices in ETH/USD on click

This currently uses the custom API to retrieve price data and ticker changes across uniswap trading pairs. 

Who maintains this extension?
This extension is currently being maintained by @bingbinglee. 
If you like using this extension please consider donating some $ACID on telegram channel
